hero.title: Experience the Spirit of Greece at Ouzo by Fire - Indiranagar
hero.subtitle: Savour authentic Mediterranean flavours, handcrafted cocktails, and an unforgettable ambiance in the heart of Indiranagar.

about.title: The Ouzo by Fire Story
about.paragraph1: At Ouzo by Fire - Indiranagar, we bring the vibrant culinary traditions of the Mediterranean to your plate. Born from Rosetta Hospitality's passion for exquisite dining, our mission is to create a haven where every meal is a celebration of authentic flavours, premium ingredients, and warm hospitality.
about.paragraph2: Step into an ambiance designed to transport you, from our artfully crafted interiors to the enticing aromas from our kitchen. Whether it's a romantic dinner or a lively gathering, Ouzo by Fire promises an unparalleled dining experience that delights all your senses and leaves you longing for your next visit.
